subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: The umpire Roy Ellison will not work a game this weekend as punishment for words directed at Redskins left tackle Trent Williams during Washington’s loss to Philadelphia on Sunday.
snippet: The umpire Roy Ellison will not work a game this weekend as punishment for words directed at Redskins left tackle Trent Williams during Washington’s loss to Philadelphia on Sunday.
